content.rendered:
Real Estate Leads using Predictive Data

We build targeted leads using stacked data that delivers higher conversion rates.

Get Targeted Leads Now

Featured on:

Smart Real Estate Investors, Agents & Wholesalers use Geopoint Data To get the Best

We build algorithmic data models that predict when someone is likely to sell their home. Our proprietary scoring system studies over 150 data points which can increase the likelihood of someone selling by 537%!

Explore Our Solutions
Clients use our data for

Bulk Mailers

Cold Call & Text

Social Media

Door Knocking

Our Solutions

Data Lists

Save Time & Money marketing to fewer homeowners with a much higher conversion rate with our targeted leads. This delivers massive advantage as These databases have never been available to the retail public at these prices, giving you a massive advantage over your competition. Choose from filters like vacant, high equity, 60+, low income and low credit.

Build Your List Now

Skip Tracing

Already have your data, but lists are incomplete? Our skip-trace append is the fastest way to complete your lead list with data that moves your business forward. We warehouse over 175MM landlines, 250MM cell phones and 150MM email addresses to fill in the gaps on your lead lists with the highest quality homeowner information.

Bulk Skip Trace Start Single Skip Trace

Why Choose Geopoint Data?

100% Match Rate lists

Our lists come with the option to add cell phone numbers, landlines and emails. No need to skip trace our lists, you can start marketing to your list instantly!

Nationwide Data

We warehouse over 99% of all homes in America. If you are looking for property or homeowner contact information anywhere is the US we are your one stop shop solution!

Focus on sales, not issues

Our amazing Support team is always there to help you grow you business & take care

Constantly Updated Leads

People move, change phone numbers, and emails all the time. While other companies resell data, we own all the data we warehouse which is updated as often as possible.

What People Say About Us

Burt Thornton

​ “Eddie took care of me on correcting a stack list that wasn’t correct. He provided excellent customer service, I ended up purchasing another 300 leads and now I understand how to build the stacks myself. Thank you again.”

Justin Lee

​ “I really like their data so far. I was new and didn’t know how to stack my list in the best way and Dom reached out to me and helped me build a list that was best to land a deal. I also spoke with Eddie and he clarified a few questions I had, he was really helpful. Data and customer service is great, I will continue to work with them and look out for their new features in the future!”

Antone Grae

​ ​ “This is the best skip tracing company I ever worked with we have been frequently getting our leads skip traced by Geopoint Data and we are getting the most accurate results. Very professional team and they provide the leads on time as what they promised. You can never go wrong with Geopoint Data thats for sure.”

Magan Fatah

​ ​ ​ “Their customer support is top notch. Eddie solved my issues in a very helpful and patient manner. Definitely would recommend!”

Vivenli Go

​“Another investor recommended Geopoint Data and I have never been so happy! The quality of the data is fantastic and the customer service was excellent! The patience that they had answering newbie questions was great! Thank you so much guys!”

Get started with Real Estate Leads using Predictive Data

Get Target Leads! Start Skip Tracing
